title: Wholewheat spaghetti with feta and Kalamata olives
ingredients: ['1/2 (500g) pack wholewheat spaghetti', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 punnet crimini mushrooms, sliced', '2 small courgettes, sliced', 'dried oregano to taste', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '12 Kalamata olives, pitted and sliced', '50g (2 oz) feta cheese, crumbled']
